targets.expr: solr_metrics_node_connections{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", base_url=~"$base_url", category=~"$node_connections_category", handler=~"$node_connections_handler", item=~"$node_connections_item"}

increase(solr_metrics_core_requests_total{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", base_url=~"$base_url", category=~"$core_requests_category", handler=~"$core_requests_handler", collection=~"$collection"}[${interval}])

increase(solr_metrics_core_time_seconds_total{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", base_url=~"$base_url", category=~"$core_requests_category", handler=~"$core_requests_handler", collection=~"$collection"}[${interval}])

increase(solr_metrics_core_client_errors_total{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", base_url=~"$base_url", category=~"$core_requests_category", handler=~"$core_requests_handler", collection=~"$collection"}[${interval}])

increase(solr_metrics_core_server_errors_total{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", base_url=~"$base_url", category=~"$core_requests_category", handler=~"$core_requests_handler", collection=~"$collection"}[${interval}])

increase(solr_metrics_core_errors_total{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", base_url=~"$base_url", category=~"$core_requests_category", handler=~"$core_requests_handler", collection=~"$collection"}[${interval}])

increase(solr_metrics_core_timeouts_total{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", base_url=~"$base_url", category=~"$core_requests_category", handler=~"$core_requests_handler", collection=~"$collection"}[${interval}])
